full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 688 Filed 06/29/22 Page 229 of 353 Juror ID: 50 44a. If yes, please explain: 45. Have you or a family member ever supported, lobbied, petitioned, protested, or worked in any other manner for or against any laws, regulations, or organizations relating to sex trafficking, sex crimes against minors, sex abuse, or sexual harassment? Yes No 45a. If yes, please explain when and what you or your family member did: 45b. If your answer to 43 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case? Yes No 45c. If yes to 45b, please explain: 46. The witnesses in this case may include law enforcement witnesses. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a law enforcement officer just like you would any other witness? Yes No 46a. If yes, please explain: -23- DOJ-OGR-00010982

text_blocks.content: 45. Have you or a family member ever supported, lobbied, petitioned, protested, or worked in any other manner for or against any laws, regulations, or organizations relating to sex trafficking, sex crimes against minors, sex abuse, or sexual harassment?
45a. If yes, please explain when and what you or your family member did:
45b. If your answer to 43 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case?
46. The witnesses in this case may include law enforcement witnesses. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a law enforcement officer just like you would any other witness?

additional_notes: The document is a juror questionnaire with some handwritten answers. The juror ID is 50. The document is page 229 of 353.
